es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.server

Interface SocketEndpoint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProxyController, ProxyPlayer

    public interface SocketEndpoint
    A very simple interface for listening and responding to data on sockets.

    Interfaz simple para recibir y responder peticiones en sockets.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dataReceived(java.lang.Object data)
      Will be called when data is received.
      void sendData(java.lang.Object data)
      Call this to send data to the other side.
      void startConnection(java.net.Socket socket, int timeout)
      Call this to start listening on the socket.
      void stopConnection()
      Call this to stop communication.

    • Method Detail

      • startConnection

        void startConnection(java.net.Socket socket,
                     int timeout)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Call this to start listening on the socket. Any incoming data will result in a call to dataReceived.

        Inicia la escucha sobre el socket. Cualquier dato entrante desencadenara una llamada a dataReceived.

        Parameters:
        socket - The socket on which they want to listen.

        El socket sobre el que se quiere escuchar.

        timeout - Time limit for awaiting connection.

        Plazo para la espera de conexion.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • stopConnection

        void stopConnection()
        Call this to stop communication.

        Para la comunicacion por el socket.

      • dataReceived

        void dataReceived(java.lang.Object data)
        Will be called when data is received.

        Gestiona los datos recibidos.

        Parameters:
        data - The receibed data.

        Los datos recibidos.

      • sendData

        void sendData(java.lang.Object data)
        Call this to send data to the other side.

        Permite enviar datos al otro lado.

        Parameters:
        data - The data to send.

        Los datos a enviar.
